example:
() => {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = React.useState(false)
  return (
    <Popover
      actions={
        <Stack direction="row" justify="end">
          <Button type="primarySubtle" onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}>
            Close this popover
          </Button>
        </Stack>
      }
      opened={isOpen}
      content={
        <Stack spacing="compact">
          <ButtonLink
            external
            type="secondary"
            fullWidth
            href="https://orbit.kiwi/components/popover/react/"
          >
            Reference
          </ButtonLink>
          <ButtonLink
            external
            type="secondary"
            fullWidth
            href="https://orbit.kiwi/components/popover/"
          >
            Guidelines
          </ButtonLink>
        </Stack>
      }
    >
      <Button
        circled
        title="Help"
        iconLeft={<Icons.QuestionCircle />}
        onClick={() => setIsOpen(true)}
      />
    </Popover>
  )
}

info.title: Actions
info.description: The actions prop adds a space for actions to popovers. Keep in mind that this overrides the close action on smaller screens, so at least one of the actions you include needs to close the popover.
